recipes.title: Turkish Mushroom Braised over Barley (Spicy)
recipes.description: A drink-friendly Turkish dish featuring mushroom and barley with a spicy twist.
steps: Prep ingredients: wash produce and julienned aromatics.
Braised the mushroom with salt, pepper, and spicy profile until nearly cooked.
Cook the barley separately according to package directions; drain well.
Sauté vegetables in fat until tender-crisp.
Combine mushroom, vegetables, and barley; add sauce and simmer to coat.
Taste and adjust seasoning (salt, acid, heat).
Rest 3–5 minutes, garnish, and serve warm.
recipes.author: Auto-generated dataset
